entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening then becoming southeast 30 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 60 near the water. Wind becoming light late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
